property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a Dragon from your hand. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has less power than the discarded card and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put them into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature attacks each turn if able. Power attacker +1000 (While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, look at your opponent's hand. Choose and discard a card from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Power attacker +3000 Triple breaker Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all fire and nature cards into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand. Your opponent discards all non-light spells from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't attack players. This creature can attack untapped light creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has 'Blocker'

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead. If you do, discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Beast Folk. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Power attacker +2000

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature would be destroyed, you may discard a Dragon from your hand. If you do, this creature stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When you put a creature into the battle zone, you may return a creature that has the same race as that creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your non-Dragon creatures gets 'power attacker +4000'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Grand Devils Meteorburn - Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, return one of your opponent's shields to his hand. (Your opponent may use

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Arc Seraphim. Meteorburn - Whenever your creatures are able to attack, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, put a non-evolution Arc Seraphim or Beast Folk from your mana zone into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Tyranno Drake Double breaker This creature can attack untapped creatures. [Fort Energy - Brave Spirit]Power attacker +4000

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Great Mecha King Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) This creature can't be attacked or blocked. This creature can't attack creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) If you have 5 or more fire creatures in your graveyard, this creature can't be attacked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race. When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player puts all non-dragon cards from their mana zone into the graveyard. Triple breaker (This creature breaks 3 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creature that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Arc Seraphim. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from each civilization from these and add them to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Armored Dragon and Fire Bird revealed in this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If all the revealed cards were Dragons this creature has 'Speed attacker'. When this creature would be discarded during your opponent's turn, you may put it into the battle zone instead. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player draws an additional card at the start of their turn. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose this one. (They can be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature breaks an additional shield for each civilization in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] This creature can't attack players. Thrilling Three: Guardian (When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. For each Guardian revealed, use the following Thrillingthree ability once. Then, put the revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.) &#xa[Thrillingthree] Return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have at least 1 darkness creature in your graveyard you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Grand Devil. Meteorburn - Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
